alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northern Columbia and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to White Springs. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... White Springs, Taylor and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
